channel.title: Comments on: Day 4 – Still in Germany

item.title: By: Silvia
item.dc:creator: Silvia
item.description: Still in Kassel..:( fingers crossed you can move on soon... good luck, viel Glueck...
item.content:encoded: Still in Kassel..:( fingers crossed you can move on soon… good luck, viel Glueck…

item.title: By: Sheila Cooper
item.dc:creator: Sheila Cooper
item.description:
Hi Guys
So sorry to hear about your problems, fingers well and truly crossed that you get everything sorted today and you can head on to Prague. Thinking about you all.
xx
item.content:encoded:
Hi Guys

So sorry to hear about your problems, fingers well and truly crossed that you get everything sorted today and you can head on to Prague. Thinking about you all.

xx

item.title: By: Edmund Leeming
item.dc:creator: Edmund Leeming
item.description: Fingers crossed & hoping that the driveshaft fits! At least you've got good weather over there - it's been continuous drizzle ere in GB, and looks to stay that way for a LONG time. Big hugs to all, and enjoy the frankfurters and sauerkraut! Xxx
item.content:encoded:
Fingers crossed & hoping that the driveshaft fits! At least you’ve got good weather over there – it’s been continuous drizzle ere in GB, and looks to stay that way for a LONG time.
Big hugs to all, and enjoy the frankfurters and sauerkraut! Xxx
